text: since August 2014 a coalition led by the
United States has been carrying out
airstrikes like this against so-called
Islamic state in Syria and Iraq these
pictures released by the US military
show fighter jets bombing bridges
controlled by is in Iraq the aim is to
destroy key infrastructure and supply
routes but they've also been targeting
the group's leaders over the past month
we killed 10 ISIL leadership figures
with targeted airstrikes including
several external attack planners some of
whom are linked to the Paris attacks
others had designs on further attacking
the West among those killed is this man
Sheriff unwad on the US says he has a
direct link to the cell leader who
allegedly planned the Paris attacks and
it's thought muah done was planning
further attacks against the West this
organization is losing its leadership ah
so we were striking at the head of this
snake like I said we haven't severed the
head of this snake yet and it's still
bad things we have to be clear about
that there's much more fighting to do an
acknowledgement that despite these
airstrikes the campaign against is is
still far from over Ben bland BBC News
